title: Phantom Phoenix
summaries: The Phantom Phoenix is a Hardmode bow dropped by the Ogre mini-boss during the Old One's Army event. It fires two arrows at a time, spreading randomly similarly to the Chlorophyte Shotbow, and also fires a large Phoenix projectile with a waving arc every third / fourth shot. The Phoenix projectile deals double base damage ( 64 / 48 base damage), can pierce an infinite amount of enemies (with a 5% damage penalty to the next hit for each enemy the projectile pierces), inflicts the Hellfire / On Fire! debuff, and explodes when colliding with a solid block. It also converts regular Wooden Arrows into Flaming Arrows, similar to the Molten Fury.
